comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: "William Farnum (born July 4, 1876, Boston, Massachusetts – died June 5, 1953, Hollywood, Los Angeles, California) was a major movie actor." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Farnum

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: In 1915, he insured his face for $ 100'000. See The Washington times, March 24, 1915, HOME EDITION, Page 11 The daily Missourian, August 27, 1916, Page Three, Image 13 describes him as one of the greatest and roughest actors in the business, but "in all his roughness there is not a person in the world that could be offended".
